name: Pozo del Gavil√°n
description:
Introduction

The only cenote (deep sinkhole in limestone with a pool at the bottom) found in Nuevo Leon. It has an 80m rappel to a pool at the bottom, which you will need to ascend back up to exit. Bring small inflatable rafts to explore the bottom.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
